gloss.pc1: Momentum / continuation strength (higher = stronger push to continue current trajectory)
gloss.pc2: Exploration margin (higher = more viable alternative routes under consideration)
gloss.d_pc1: Change in momentum since last pause (near zero = momentum exhausted)
gloss.d_pc2: Change in exploration (near zero = alternatives exhausted)
gloss.routing_entropy: Dispersion of expert votes (lower = coalition consensus)
gloss.expert_switch_rate: How often expert coalition changes (lower = stabilized routing)
